tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE debtors (
  debtor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  total_debt DECIMAL(10, 2),
  last_interaction TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE debtor_communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    debtor_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE debtor_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    debtor_id INT,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  communication_type VARCHAR(255),
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE debt_resolution (
  resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  resolution_date DATE,
  resolution_type VARCHAR(255),
  resolution_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
  interaction_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    debtor_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE debtor_details (
    debtor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    debtor_name VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE resolution_logs (
    resolution_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    resolution_date TIMESTAMP,
    resolution_details TEXT,
    resolved_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE payment_logs (
    payment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    debtor_id INT,
    payment_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_method VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE debt_details (
    debt_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    debtor_id INT,
    amount_owed DECIMAL(10, 2),
    due_date DATE,
    debt_status VARCHAR(20)
);
